videos.description: LeBron James throws an inbounds pass to Kyle Kuzma who beats the shot clock buzzer with a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One_Play (Kuzma beats shot clock with turnaround 3) 2021/2/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kuzma beats shot clock with turnaround 3

videos.description: Kyle Kuzma accidentally wipes blood on Anthony Davis' sweater during a Lakers' timeout vs. the Heat.

tracking.trackingName: NBA One-Play (AD keeps coaching Kuzma despite getting blood on his shirt) 2021/2/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: AD keeps coaching Kuzma despite getting blood on his shirt

videos.description: LeBron James gets downhill and finishes through traffic for the tough bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron falls as he converts and-1 layup) 2021/2/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron falls as he converts and-1 layup

videos.description: Tyler Herro drives inside and powers through for an and-1 floater vs. the Lakers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro floats in and-1 bucket) 2021/2/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro floats in and-1 bucket

videos.description: LeBron James kicks it to Marc Gasol, who drains the 3-pointer as the second-quarter buzzer sounds.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Gasol beats halftime buzzer with 3) 2021/2/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gasol beats halftime buzzer with 3

videos.description: Bam Adebayo comes from behind to block LeBron James' shot off the backboard.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam swats LeBron's layup off the glass) 2021/2/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam swats LeBron's layup off the glass

videos.description: Bam Adebayo is excited to celebrate the Heat's 96-94 win vs. the Lakers as Jimmy Butler shares his thoughts on the game with Rachel Nichols.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Bam crashes Butler's postgame interview) 2021/2/20

videos.headline: Bam crashes Butler's postgame interview
